content: cool, glad to see this back online and I can confirm its working for me now
is this deployment in sync with the master branch of https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/plan-net_client or is there some other repo / other branch which this is deployed from?

I can confirm its working for me now

never mind, I confirm that the first page (where it looks up the counts for all the resource types) is working for me. but all subsequent pages result in this:
image.png
I checked my server logs, but I don't see these pages even attempting a query (and they fail very fast)
ok, I figured it out. my chrome (v87) was blocking cookies and the site doesn't work without cookies
Yes, I think we are using the simplest persistence mechanism (cookies) to store session information. Sorry about that!
